talk.author: did:plc:rrnrofn6wr7ydqimpkzbfwgl
talk.utter: speaking of presidents not facing consequences for funneling arms to far-right militaries committing war crimes, the elder bush was up to his neck in iran-contra

talk.author: did:plc:44yddrxlbkmufwcl6yajflro
talk.utter:
It was once a common practice to hire bike messengers to sit in line overnight to claim seats in Congressional hearings. My Iran-Contra guy was so late they didn't let him in, so I stayed.

I had the immense pleasure of spitting in North's Chinese food a year later, at his fancy new lobbying office.

talk.author: did:plc:rrnrofn6wr7ydqimpkzbfwgl
talk.utter:
look at what elliot abrams is up to lately

it is very tiring to be able to remember bush's election, where a flat-footed doofus tacked right and lost to the war criminal who ran a cruel and brutally racist campaign. that had its share of democratic hippy-punching too, over jackson that time
